course_description: This course is the second of the sequence of Math 535-536 and as such will continue to develop the topics from the first semester. Specific topics will include finite geometries, Hadermard matrices, Latin Squares, an introduction to design theory, extremal set theory and an introduction to combinatorial coding theory.
schedule_location: MW 1pm-2:15pm in Math & Science Center - E408
sections: Class Nbr: 2985, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 1-2:15p, Instructor: L. Nurbekyan, Status: Open
